CYBER SECURITY ETHICS

Learn to protect information responsibly and ethically

What is Cybersecurity Ethics?

Cybersecurity ethics refers to the moral principles guiding individuals and organizations in the digital world. It focuses on protecting sensitive information, maintaining privacy, and ensuring safe practices online.

Key Areas in Cybersecurity Ethics

Privacy Protection

Respecting personal data and keeping user information confidential.

Ethical Hacking

Testing systems for vulnerabilities legally to improve security.

Data Security

Ensuring sensitive data is stored and transmitted securely.

Responsible Use

Using technology and networks without causing harm to others.
